title: 03/09/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/09/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Chris Simms about the big decisions made in the NFL yesterday? Would you rather have Aaron Rodgers or Russ Wilson if you're the Broncos? Booger McFarland explains which move he liked least. And Mavericks legend Dirk Nowitzki goes down memory and shares some stories from his career about Kobe and 2011 NBA Finals

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
